hints.content:
At camp, $\tealE{4}$ kids went home and $\goldE{18}$ kids went hiking.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/263a9022997cc12e4702b7fdb6be91e88a45c060)

$\tealE{4} + \goldE{18} = \maroonD{22}$

$\blueE{41}$ kids went swimming.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a2eea0c1479a6d56503cd3f49619d51ae7918b06)

$\maroonD{22} + \blueE{41} = \purpleD{63}$

There were $\purpleD{63}$ total kids at Camp Sunshine.
$\purpleD{63}$ kids started the day at Camp Sunshine.

question.content:
At Camp Sunshine, $4$ kids went home sick.  Of the remaining campers, $18$ kids went hiking and the other $41$ kids spent the day swimming.  

**How many kids started the day at Camp Sunshine?**    

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] kids
